alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 10:08AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Galveston, Chambers, southeastern Liberty and east central Harris Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1008 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Rollover Pass to San Jacinto State Park. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Pasadena, Baytown, La Porte, Deer Park, Beach City, Channelview, Highlands, Barrett, Crosby, Mont Belvieu, Anahuac, Shoreacres, Old River-Winfree, Cove, Morgan`s Point, High Island, San Jacinto State Park, Crystal Beach, Smith Point and Gilchrist. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty
